item.title: OPEN TEXT CORP 10-K
item.description: OPEN TEXT CORP, which is in the Services-Computer Integrated Systems Design [7373] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 05, 2022 had 74502 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 535 instances may - 525 instances 30 - 524 instances 1 - 523 instances june - 522 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
